oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Jim Hurst Trio - 2015-11-07
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by the Jim Hurst Trio as part of the Bluegrass and Beyond program from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 7, 2015. Second performer of four. Presented by the Crump family and Cotton Music. Honoring George A. and Marjorie S. Crump.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jim Hurst Trio;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Features Nate Lee, Todd Phillips and Jim Hurst. Performances include; Nothing Like A Hundred Miles -- The Pearl Of Pearl Kentucky -- Steven's Deep Coal Mine -- Stafford Stomp -- Widow's Weeds -- Kentucky Sunrise Waltz -- Wayfaring Stranger / Unidentified Instrumental -- Same Old Moon -- Look Down Hannah - Chocolate Chaise Lounge -- Mando Bounce.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Hurst, Jim (Guitarist); Phillips, Todd; Lee, Nate; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
